Therapy.title: Therapy book kariye
Therapy.introduction: {partnerName} ne Bloom ke saath bhagidari kari hai taki aapko muft aur gupniye sahayata mil sake. Bloom apko ek therapist se jodta hai vo anuroop sahayata pradaan kar sakta hai. Apke pas apni pasand ke therapist ke saath  che, ek ghante se sessions hain.
Therapy.therapySessionsRemaining: Aapke paas <strongText>4</strongText> therapy sessions hain book karne ke liye.
Therapy.noTherapySessionsRemaining: Abhi aapke paas book karne ke liye koi uplabdh session nahi hain.

steps.step1: Ap hamare dhaayn se chune hue, bahubhashi therapists se chun sakte hain.
steps.step2: Vo din aur samay chuniye jo apke liye sabse acha kaam karta hain. Saare sessions online hain.
steps.step3: Agar aap apka mann badal jata hain, toh kisi bhi samay aap apne sessions rok sakte hain ya therapist badal sakte hain.
steps.step4: Aap jo kuch bhi sajha karte hain vo apke aur therapist ke beech poori tarha gopniye rehta hai.

Therapy.faqHeader: Therapy ke bare mein adhik jaankari

faqs.faqBody0: Yeh programme kisi bhi {partnerName} user ke liye uplabhd hai jo yaun shoshan ya hinsa ke bare mein {partnerName} ko report karta hai. Chahe aapka background, race, jati, umar, viklangata, dharm ya vishvas, sexuality, ling pehchan ya zindegi ki paristhitiyan kuch bhi ho - hum aapke liye yahan hain.
faqs.faqTitle1: Kya mujhe therapy ke liye paise dene honge?
faqs.faqBody1: Iss programme ke madhyam se Bloom {partnerName} ke users ko kai tareeke ki sevaein de raha hai taki vo apne yaun shoshan ya hinsa ke anubhav se heal ho sakein. Ismein free access shamil hai Bloom ki swa-nirdeshit library jismein survivors, aur trauma-informed therapists ke banaye gaye sansadhan hain aur course facilitators ke saath 1:1 online chat ka avsar hai. {partnerName} users jinhone gehra trauma anubhav kiya hai unhe che 50-minute ke therapy sessions diye jaenge jiske liye unhe koi paise dene ki zaroorat nahi hai.
faqs.faqTitle2: Mujhe kitne therapy sessions milte hain?
faqs.faqBody2: {partnerName} users jinhone gehra trauma anubhav kiya hai unhe che 50-minute ke therapy sessions diye jaenge jiske liye unhe koi paise dene ki zaroorat nahi hai.
faqs.faqTitle3: Mere paas kitna time hai apne therapy sessions book karne ka?
faqs.faqBody3: Aap chun sakte hain ko aap kitni baar apne sessions chahte hain, chahe vo ek session har hafte ho ya har mahine. Hum anushansa karte hain ki aap apne therapist se iss bare mein baat karein and fir decide karein ki aapke liye sabse acha kya kaam karega. Kripya apne access code ke milne ke teen mahine ke andar apna pehla session book karein.
faqs.faqTitle4: Kya mein in-person sessions kar sakti/sakta hoon?
faqs.faqBody4: Sabhi sessions video call ke madhyam se online liye jaenge. Bloom digital, remote sahayata mein mahir hai. Inn therapists ko unke anbhav aur kaushal ko dekhte hue chuna gaya hai taki vo online sessions bahut ache se le sakein.
faqs.faqTitle5: Yadi mein apne therapy session mein nahi aa pati/pata toh kya hoga?
faqs.faqBody5: Apke confirmation mail mein jo link hai usko therapy reschedule karne ke liye istemaal kariye, jitna dhyaan se ho sakta hai utne dhyaan se. Yadi session ko cancel karne ka notice 48 ghanton ke andar nahi ata toh usse apke therapy session ke roop mein gina jaega, toh kripya session rescheduling pehle se karne ki koshish karein.
faqs.faqTitle6: Kya hoga agar mujhe mere mutabik koi therapy slot nahi mil raha?
faqs.faqBody6: {partnerName} ke saath Bloom ki sajhedari (partnership) aur sahayata ke programme shuru hone ke shuruati charan mein hai. Iska matlab hai ki hamare paas abhi therapists ki poori team uplabdh nahi ho sakti hai. Aapki avashyaktaon ko poora karne ke liye hamari uplabdhi zadatar timezones mein hain. Yadi aap ko therapist ya sahi samay ka slot nahi mil raha hai toh kripya hamein <faqLink>contact form</faqLink> ke dwara jaankari deejiye. Yeh hamein kisi bhi badhaon ko suljhane aur door karne mein madad karega.
faqs.faqTitle7:
Kya hoga agar meri therapist ke sath 
bani nahi?
faqs.faqBody7: Hum sabhi insaan hain, isliye chinta na karein agar jis therapist se apne baat kari usse aapki baat nahi bani. Aap apne bache hue session(s) kisi doosre therapist ke saath book kar sakte hain.
faqs.faqTitle8: Kya hota jab mere saare che sessions ho jate hain?
faqs.faqBody8: Apne therapist ke saath apni zarooraton ke bare mein baat kariye aur sochiye agar apko aur sessions se faeda hoga. Bloom ke therapist aapke saath apni price ki listing share kar sakte hain and fir aap tay kar sakte hain ki aapko unke saath therapy jaari rakhni hai ya nahi.
faqs.faqTitle9: Mein therapy nahi gai, par platform par dikha raha hai ki mere pass ek kam session hai?
faqs.faqBody9: Humara therapists aapke liye slot rakhte hain, isliye hum unke samay ka samman karna chahte hain. Yadi aap apne therapy session mein shaamil nahi hue ya 48 ghante se kam samay ke notice ke saath session cancel ya reschedule kiya gaya, toh durbhagya se, yeh apke therapy session ke roop mein gina jaega. Yadi aapko lagta hai ki koi galti hai, toh kripya hamare <faqLink>contact form</faqLink> ke dwara message karein.
faqs.faqTitle10: Mein jo therapy session mein baat karti hu, kya vo niji/private hai?
faqs.faqBody10: Haan. Aap kisi bhi therapist ke saath jo bhi baat karte karenge, vo aapke aur therapist ke beech poori tarha se private hoga. Kisi bhi samay {partnerName} ki iss jaankari par pahuch nahi hogi.
faqs.faqTitle11: Kya mere dwara acess ki jaane wali sahayata gopniye hai?
faqs.faqBody11: Haan. Bloom is program hai jisse global charity Chayn chalati hai. Apne kitne sessions istemaal kiye, iss bare mein jaankari poori tarha se private rahegi. Chayn iss ya koi bhi vyaktigat jankari ko {partnerName} ya kisi third-party ko nahi deta.
faqs.faqBody12: Therapy session mein bhag lekar aap therapist ke saaath samjhaota kar rahe hain ki vo apko apni sevaiye swatantra practitioner ke taur par denge. Iss waiver of liability mein koi bhi vo risk shamil hain jo therapy session mein bhaag lene se aate hain. Kripya neeche likhi jankari dekhein:
faqs.faqList12Item1: Online therapy mein bhaag lene wale users samjhein ki yeh sevaye clinical mansik swasth dekhbhal ya chikitsak dekhbhal ko substitute nahi karti aur iska udheshye kisi mansik swasth ya chikitsak bimari ka nidaan (diagnosis),  upchaar (treatment) ya ilaaj (cure) nahi hai. Aapko yeh bhi samjhna hoga ki jis therapist ko aapne kaam karne ke liye chuna hai vo medical professional nahi hain.
faqs.faqList12Item2: Aap samjhenge aur sehmat honge ki apne therapy sessions ke dauraan aap apni bhalai ke liye poori tarha se zimmedar hain, aur baad mein apni choices aur nirnay ke liye bhi.
faqs.faqList12Item3: Aap samjhenge ki records ke liye therapists aapke sessions se notes banate hain. Jo therapist aapke saath kaam kar rahe hain sirf wahi yeh notes dekh sakte hain. Yeh aapki gupniyeta aur akhandta ka samman karte hue hamesha gopniye tareeke se kiya jaega.
faqs.faqList12Item4: Aap yeh bhi samjhenge ki therapist ke di gai tippniya aur vichar poori tarha se aapki recovery ke safar ko sahayata dene ke liye hain. Aapke therapist therapy shuru karne se pehle aapko kisi bhi suraksha neeti ya safeguarding policies ke bare mein bateinge jinka vo palan karte hain, jiski vajah se vo apke bare mein jaankari sajha kar sakte hain apki suraksha sunuchit karne ke liye.
faqs.faqList12Item5: Apne hamari Privacy Policy ko pad aur samjh liya hoga: (https://www.notion.so/Privacy-policy-ad4a447bc1aa4d7294d9af5f8be7ae43).
faqs.faqList12Item6: Aap samjh gaye honge ki technology ka upyog hamesha surakshit nahi hota aur email, text, phone, video call aur anya technology ke upyog mein guptnyeta ke jhokhim ko sweekar karte hain.
faqs.faqList12Item7: Aap etadwara apne therapist, Bumble, Chayn ko mukt (waive) karte hain, maaf karte hain, bari (acquit) karte hain, aur hamesha ke liye chutti (discharge) dete hain, vo har daavey, karvai, maang ya muaavajon (right to compensation) se jismein nuksaan ka dava ho ya fir vo dava ho apke khud ke kare actions ya chook se ya fir aapke therapist ke actions aur chook se jo hui ho therapist ki di hui koi bhi salah se apke therapeutic relationship ke dauran jo iss agreement pe based hai. Aap aage ghoshit karte hain aur pratinidhtav (represent) karte hain ki iss samjhaute mein koi vada, praloban (inducement) ya samjhauta jo iss agreement ke bahar ho - nahi kiya gaya hai.
faqs.faqList12Item8: Apke therapist ke paas haq hai ki vo apni sevanein dene se mana kar dein. Your therapist reserves the right to refuse access to their services. Saare international clients ke liye saari therapy aur counselling ki sevayein therapist ke desh ke kanoon ke hisaab se hongi aur koi bhi vivaad uss dekh ke kanoon de adhaar pe hoga.
faqs.faqBody13: Bloom ek trauma support (sahayata) programme pesh karna chahta hai jo {partnerName} ke users ki zarooratein poori kare. Yadi hamare support (sahayata) programme ke bare mein aapke paas koi feedback, vichar ya sujhaav hain, toh kripya humein iske madhyam se bataiye <faqLink>contact form</faqLink>. Shukriya!

confirmation.title: Aapne book karliya hai!
confirmation.introduction: Aapka therapy session book ho gaya hai. Hum jaante hain ki yeh kadam uthana mushkil ho sakta hai, toh apne aapko shabashi dijiye. 'Bloom' ka mail apne email par check kariyega. Usmein aapko samay, date aur video call ka link bheja jaega. Agar aap session mein shamil nahi ho sakte toh iss same email mein session ko reschedule karne ka bhi link hoga.
confirmation.returnDescription: Apne therapy session ke baad, doosra session book karne ke liye vapis Bloom par aiye.
confirmation.bookmarkDescription: URLs bhoolna asaan hai! Iss page ko bookmark karein taki aap humein bhoole nahi: <bookingLink>bloom.chayn.co</bookingLink>

accessGuard.title: Therapy uplabdh nahi hai
accessGuard.introduction: Apke Bloom account mein therapy sessions ki access shamil nahi hai. Yadi yeh theek nahi lag raha toh <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko message kariye</contactLink>.
